about_the_game:
One fateful night, a boy mysteriously vanished from his room, leaving behind his favorite toy - a loyal little car. Determined to find out what happened to its owner, the brave toy embarks on an unforgettable adventure.

As the player, you’ll take control of the toy car, solving clever puzzles, navigating tricky challenges, and finding ways to escape the boy’s home. But the journey doesn’t stop there - the car ventures beyond the house into the streets, parks, and many other exciting locations, all while chasing clues about the boy's disappearance.

The big world outside is full of dangers for a small toy car. Falling from great heights, fire, and water are just some of the perils you’ll face. And there are enemies too - dogs, robotic vacuums, and other toys that stand in your way. But don’t worry! You can push, move, and interact with almost anything, thanks to the game’s dynamic physics system, letting you find creative solutions to every obstacle.

This thrilling adventure, packed with heartwarming and emotional moments, is a game the whole family can enjoy. Uncover the mystery of the boy’s disappearance - maybe he needs your help more than you think!

Add it to your Wishlist today and don’t miss the release!

name: Lost Host

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX3060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: One fateful night, a boy mysteriously vanished from his room, leaving behind his favorite toy - a loyal little car. Determined to find out what happened to its owner, the brave toy embarks on an unforgettable adventure.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Lithuanian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
